articles.content: Venugopal Lambu, a whole-time director and Markets President has resigned from LTIMindtree, the company said on January 3. This is the first big exit from the company following the merger, and LTIMin… [+1492 chars]

articles.title: NTPC starts India's first green hydrogen blending project - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The project is a joint effort of NTPC and Gujarat Gas Ltd (GGL).
articles.content: State-owned NTPC on January 3,  said it has commissioned India's first green hydrogen blending project. The green hydrogen blending has been started in the piped natural gas (PNG) network of NTPC Kaw… [+1000 chars]

articles.title: HDFC Bank hikes bulk FD rates, new interest rates are effective from today | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The leading private sector lender HDFC Bank has hiked its interest rates on bulk fixed deposits (FDs) of more than  ₹2 Cr to less than  ₹5 Crores.

articles.title: Gold rates jump in Hyderabad, near all-time high - The Siasat Daily
articles.description: Ahead of the US Federal Reserve's latest policy meeting, the rates of gold jumped in Hyderabad and other metro cities on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Hyderabad: Ahead of the US Federal Reserve’s latest policy meeting due this week, the rates of gold jumped in Hyderabad and other metro cities on Tuesday.
